title: WTB: WaJo portrait, Cobb Red, Marquard portrait
author: groundskeeper

posts.post_title: WTB: WaJo portrait, Cobb Red, Marquard portrait
posts.post_content:
Hi!
The three cards I'm looking at in T206 are portraits of Walter Johnson, Rube Marquard, and Ty Cobb (red or green, but I'm more likely to buy a red I think).

PSA 3 and up, unless it's a really nice 2 (no creases).

Thanks guys!
